basics.name: Achim Christ
basics.label: Master Certified Technical Specialist
basics.summary: I am a Master Certified Technical Specialist at IBM. In this role I lead complex infrastructure modernization projects for the most innovative companies around the globe, to help them get the most out of their IBM solutions.__break__I use my deep technical knowledge for enabling customers, business partners, and fellow IBM architects to build hybrid cloud infrastructure for high-performance big data and machine learning use cases. I successfully led international teams, helped launch new technologies, and expanded into new market segments. Furthermore, I am training instructor, conference speaker, open source maintainer, and author of numerous books, papers and articles.__break__I love to dig into customer problems and solve them with cutting-edge technology. This calls to all my passions; it incorporates curiosity, creativity, and problem solving. My specialties include quickly learning new skills, staying on top of industry trends, translating customer requirements into technical specifications, and applying DevOps principles to foster continuous improvement.__break__I am a graduate of RheinMain University of Applied Sciences, where I majored in Computer Science. I currently live in Mainz, Germany, with my wife and my son. When I'm not exploring new technology, you can find me listening to podcasts, taking pictures, cycling, or running.

work.summary: As solution architect for IBM Expert Labs I define and implement cutting-edge infrastructure solutions in alignment with business requirements. I collaborate with customers and sales teams to understand client needs, lead technical decisions, and build solution proposals incorporating IBM servers, storage, and software. I scope and oversee activities, roles, and timelines for professional services provided to clients spanning various industries.

As senior technical specialist for IBM Systems I helped clients deploy, modernize, and efficiently manage software-defined infrastructure solutions. I headed service development, delivery, and training for various strategic IBM Storage products across EMEA. I became leading technical expert on scale-out file and object storage technology, specialized in automation and cloud orchestration. Furthermore, I was technical lead for a group of 8 senior specialists.
highlights: 2019: Lab Services Award for demonstrating the practice: Put the client first
2017: Lab Services Award for demonstrating the practice: Share expertise
2016: Lab Services Award for demonstrating the practice: Listen for need, envision the future
2015: Outstanding Technical Achievement Award for: Creating significant assets for IBM Spectrum Scale / ESS storage
2012: Lab Service Award for: Delivery excellence in the execution of IBM Storwize V7000 Unified service development & training
2011: Lab Service Award for: Delivery excellence in the development & execution of IBM Information Archive services with superior customer satisfaction feedback

work.summary: As Lab Services CTO for IBM Storage I developed and established the strategic technical direction for the EMEA team. I assessed emerging technology trends to ensure that the skills of 80+ consultants remained current in order to best support customers in a rapidly evolving market. I liaised with senior leadership to replicate best practices among 9 geographies in Europe, Middle East, and Africa.

highlights: One project later adapted across IBM Storage product portfolio
